Parallels.ab: vīse māzdaiiasne ~ Y12.7 māzdaiiasninąm vīsąm; ~ Y12.8, VS18.12, māzdaiiasnīš auui vīsō; ~ VS19.12 vīsat̰ yat̰ māzdaiiasnōḭt̰.

Quotations.ab: jīuu pad surunuiiā̊ andar rēzišn be pad dah-hōmāst abar ān ī pad vīspaiia ... āfrīnāmi andar rēzišn zōhrag 4 angust az āb ul dārišn ciyōn guft
At surunuiiā̊ he has to pour (zōhr) into the jīuu, except in the Dō-Hōmāst, when it is at vīspaiia ... āfrīnāmi (Y68.15). The zōhrag has to be hold four fingers from the water, as it has been said.
